Caption: Figure 1. Examples of note taking activities during our observational study. Sometimes note takers are disconnected from group activities.
Figure 2. Partial screen shot of Explorer, depicting a comparison chart that visualizes margin, quantity sold, and sales revenue over category, filtered based on state (Texas) and city (Dallas).
Figure 3. Activities we observed within problem definition, visualization, analysis, and dissemination phases of collaborative visual analytics.
Table 1. Number of note taking and chart saving actions by each group during task 2. Shaded groups relied heavily on saved charts for analysis.
Figure 5. Three personal notes taken by participants in one group. This group did not have a defined note taker.
Figure 4. A note that was taken for group use. It is nicely structured and is comprised of information for all three rivaling participants.
Figure 6. A participant organized information in a tabular format. This note shows that the group has calculated values for all four quarters and for all three states.
